title: Making haiku
creator_credit: Annette Klingman and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Introduces and explains the form of Haiku and scenes from nature which inspire Haiku. Emphasises the simplicity and beauty of this form of poetry and encourages students creativity in composing their own. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
